parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table where to get the components; 0-based index

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: Configuration for which to get components in top-level only BOMs; specify an empty string for parts only and indented BOMs

title: IBomTableAnnotation.GetComponents2
description: Gets the components in the specified row for the specified configuration in this BOM table annotation.
signature:
System.Object GetComponents2( 
   System.Int32
RowIndex
,
   System.String
Configuration
)

parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table where to get the components; 0-based index

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: Configuration for which to get components in top-level only BOMs; specify an empty string for parts only and indented BOMs

returns: Array of components in the specified row for the specified configuration
